t=(int)(raw_input())
for i in range(t):
    n=(int)(raw_input())
    a=n/7
    b=n/4
    s=0
    i=a
    f=0
    while i>=0:
        s=i*7
        if (n-s)%4==0:#we want more n more no of fours
            print s
            f=1
            break
        else:
            i-=1
    if f==0:
        print -1
